          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Att studera</string>
            <string language="en">To study</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour étudier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para estudar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per studiare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στη μελέτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para estudiar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här finns övningar som på olika sätt behandlar området skola och utbildning, samtidigt som de ger information om det svenska skolväsendet.Modul 6 - Vad vill du?Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here are exercises in different ways deal with education and training, while providing information about the Swedish school system. Module 6 - What do you want? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">skola</string>
            <string language="sv">utbildning</string>
            <string language="sv">Sverige</string>
            <string language="sv">studera</string>
            <string language="sv">studier</string>
            <string language="sv">betyg</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">school</string>
            <string language="en">Education</string>
            <string language="en">Sweden</string>
            <string language="en">study</string>
            <string language="en">studies</string>
            <string language="en">rating</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sind hier Übungen in den unterschiedlichen 
Methoden beschäftigen Ausbildung und Training, beim Zur Verfügung 
stellen von von Informationen über das schwedische Schulsystem. 
Modul 6 - Was wünschen Sie? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici les exercices dans différentes voies 
traitent l'éducation et la formation, tout en fournissant des 
informations au sujet du système scolaire suédois. Module 6 - 
Que voulez-vous ? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estão aqui os exercícios em maneiras diferentes 
tratam da instrução e do treinamento, ao fornecer a informação 
sobre o sistema de escola sueco. Módulo 6 - Que você 
quer? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui sono le esercitazioni nei modi differenti si 
occupano di istruzione e di formazione, mentre forniscono le 
informazioni sul sistema scolastico svedese. Modulo 6 - 
Che cosa desiderate? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ είναι οι ασκήσεις με τους διαφορετικούς τρόπους 
εξετάζουν την εκπαίδευση και την κατάρτιση, παρέχοντας τις 
πληροφορίες για το σουηδικό σχολικό σύστημα. Ενότητα 6 - τι
θέλετε; Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí están los ejercicios de diversas maneras 
se ocupan de la educación y del entrenamiento, mientras que 
proporcionan a la información sobre el sistema escolar sueco. 
Módulo 6 - ¿Qué usted desea? Safir.</string>
          </description>
